item.title: About
item.description: I’m a backend-developer with more than 10 years in industry. My CV Experience New Cloud Technologies (Feb. 2020 - present) TechOps (May. 2016 - Jan. 2020) Sputnik (Apr. 2015 - May. 2016) MegaLabs (Jun. 2012 - Apr. 2015) Ru-Center (Apr. 2010 - Jun. 2012) Education Moscow State Aviation Technological University (2015-2011)

item.title: Split .gitconfig for domains
item.description:
It’s possible to use –local and –global .gitconfig’s.

Sometimes you need something in between, i.e. your workspace uses GitLab on a private domain and you use GitHub for your own purposes.
